00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT3O
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT3O

00034 template <typename Numeric>
00035 class Point3o : public Point2o<Numeric> {
00036 private:
00037     // We re-define this method, inherited from Point2o, as
00038     // private, so we make it unaccessible from outside.
00039     Point2o<Numeric> rotate(double thetar);
00040 public:
00041     Numeric z;
00043     // FIXME: DC: non sono d'accordo: theta = yaw (cioe' intorno all'asse z, generalizzazione del 2D)
00044     // phi=pitch, cioe' intorno all'asse y, gamma = roll, cioe' intorno all'asse x
00045     double phi, gamma;
00046     
00048 
00049     Point3o() : Point2o<Numeric>(), z(0), phi(0), gamma(0) { }
00050     Point3o(Numeric x, Numeric y, Numeric z, double theta, double phi, double gamma) : Point2o<Numeric>(x, y, theta), z(z), phi(phi), gamma(gamma) { }
00051     explicit Point3o(const Point2o<Numeric>& p, Numeric z=0, double phi=0, double gamma=0) : Point2o<Numeric>(p), z(z), phi(phi), gamma(gamma) { }
00052     Point3o(const Point3o<Numeric>& p) : Point2o<Numeric>(p.x, p.y, p.theta), z(p.z), phi(p.phi), gamma(p.gamma) { }
00054     
00056 
00057 
00058     Point3o<Numeric>  operator- (const Point3o<Numeric>&  p) const { 
00059         return Point3o<Numeric>(this->x - p.x, this->y - p.y, this->z - p.z, this->theta-p.theta, this->phi - p.phi, this->gamma - p.gamma); 
00060     }
00061     
00063     Point3o<Numeric> operator+ (const Point3o<Numeric>&  p) const { 
00064         return Point3o<Numeric>(this->x + p.x, this->y + p.y, this->z + p.z, this->theta + p.theta, this->phi + p.phi, this->gamma + p.gamma); 
00065     }
00066     
00068     Point3o<Numeric>  operator* (const Numeric& n) const { 
00069         return Point3o<Numeric>(  this->x * n,   this->y * n, this->z * n, this->theta*n, this->phi * n, this->gamma * n); 
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00073     // Returns the matrix unfolded: (m11 m12 m13 m21 m22 m23 m31 m32 m33)
00074     // See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conversion_between_quaternions_and_Euler_angles
00075     static double *rollPitchYawMatrix(double roll, double pitch, double yaw) {
00076         double *temp = new double[9];
00077         // We cache our cosines and sines
00078         double sintheta = sin(pitch);
00079         double costheta = cos(pitch);
00080         double sinpsi = sin(yaw);
00081         double cospsi = cos(yaw);
00082         double cosphi = cos(roll);
00083         double sinphi = sin(roll);
00084         temp[0] = costheta * cospsi;
00085         temp[1] = -cosphi * sinpsi + sinphi * sintheta * cospsi;
00086         temp[2] = sinphi * sinpsi + cosphi * sintheta * cospsi;
00087         temp[3] = costheta * sinpsi;
00088         temp[4] = cosphi * cospsi + sinphi * sintheta * sinpsi;
00089         temp[5] = -sinphi * cospsi + cosphi * sintheta * sinpsi;
00090         temp[6] = -sintheta;
00091         temp[7] = sinphi * costheta;
00092         temp[8] = cosphi * costheta;
00093         return temp;
00094     }
00095 
00097     Point2o<Numeric> point2o() const { return Point2o<Numeric>(this->x,this->y, this->theta); }
00099     
00101 
00102     
00103     bool operator==(const Point3o<Numeric>& p) const {
00104         return this->x == p.x && this->y == p.y && this->z == p.z && this->theta == p.theta && this->phi == p.phi && this->gamma == p.gamma; }
00105     
00106     bool operator!=(const Point3o<Numeric>& p) const {
00107         return !(p == *this);
00108     }
00110     
00112 
00113     
00122     std::string toString() const
00123     {
00124         std::ostringstream oss;
00125         oss << "(" << this->x << "," << this->y << "," << this->z << ";" << rad2deg(this->theta) << "," << rad2deg(phi) << "," << rad2deg(gamma) << ")";
00126         return oss.str();
00127     }
00128     
00130     std::string outputSpaceSeparated() const {
00131         std::ostringstream oss;
00132         oss << " " << this->x << " " << this->y << " " << z << " "  << this->theta << " " << phi << " " << gamma;
00133         return oss.str();
00134     }
00135     
00137     
00138 };

00140 // FIXME: fa quello che dovrebbe? L'ho adattata "a naso" (Arrigo)
00141 template <class Numeric>
00142 Point3o<Numeric> weightedMean(const Point3o<Numeric>& p1, const Point3o<Numeric>& p2, double alpha){
00143     double beta=1-alpha;
00144     Numeric x = (Numeric)(beta*p1.x+alpha*p2.x);
00145     Numeric y = (Numeric)(beta*p1.y+alpha*p2.y);
00146     Numeric z = (Numeric)(beta*p1.z+alpha*p2.z);
00147     double theta = angleWeightedMean(p1.theta,p2.theta,alpha);
00148     double phi = angleWeightedMean(p1.phi,p2.phi,alpha);
00149     double gamma = angleWeightedMean(p1.theta,p2.theta,gamma);
00150     return Point3o<Numeric>(x,y,z,theta,phi,gamma);
00151 }

00156 template <class Numeric>
00157 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream&os, const Point3o<Numeric>&p) {
00158     return os << " " << p.x << " " << p.y << " " << p.z << " " << p.theta << " " << p.phi << " " << p.gamma;
00159 }
00160 
00161 template <class Numeric>
00162 std::istream& operator>>( std::istream&is, Point3o<Numeric>&p) {
00163     return is >> p.x >> p.y >> p.z >> p.theta >> p.phi >> p.gamma;
00164 }
